amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 116-289 to prohibit Agency assistance for the governments of certain countries unless the President certifies that the government is cooperating with the U.S. to prevent illegal trafficking of synthetic opioids.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit Agency assistance for the governments of certain countries unless the President certifies that the government is cooperating with the U.S. to prevent illegal trafficking of synthetic opioids.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 214 (Roll no. 620).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Davidson (OH).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 214 (Roll no. 620).
